Simple Column.description: The column chart represents data as a series of vertical columns.

Stacked Column.description: The column chart represents data as a series of stacked vertical columns.

Simple Bar.description: The bar chart represents data as a series of horizontal bars.

Simple Line.description: The line chart represents data using a number of lines.

Line With Gaps.description: This example shows how the line series handles gaps in the data.

Simple Area.description: This area chart represents data using areas.
